long_description: With an innnovative twist closure that seals chalk inside and shrinks the volume down for easy transport, the Arc'teryx Aperture Chalk Bag is ideal for bouldering, sport climbing and trad climbing. To open the chalk bag, simply unsnap the tab and the bag will untwist as the bottom drops down; to close, twist it up and snap the tab to keep the bag stowed compactly. Reinforced rim keeps the bag open and chalk easily accessible when in use. Injection-molded belt attachment/slider doubles as a bottle opener. Includes an adjustable waistbelt and a loop for holding a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Arc'teryx Aperture Chalk Bag has a fleece-lined chalk reservoir that holds plenty of powder (chalk sold separately).
